name: Tetris-escape
description:
You're Catty the cat, and you don't like lava, lucky for you, Robbie the rabbit your friend can spawn block to help you ! Unfortunately all that lava is stressful, so Robbie's power is a bit inconsistent, so avoid staying on lava blocks, and beware of those ice blocks !

Controls :

Player 1 :

  • Z -> Rotate piece
  • S -> Drop piece
  • Q & D -> left and right

Player 2 :

  • Up -> jump & double jump
  • Left & Right -> move

Credits :

Music : https://www.musicscreen.org/Royalty-free/Music/GypsyPno.php
https://www.musicscreen.be/musique-libre-de-droit/Catalogue/Cherche-moi-Long.html

Soundeffects : http://www.soundsboom.com/
